name: ListBoxDocTemplates
description:
Retrieve Box Doc Gen templates the user collaborates on.

Fetches a list of Box Doc Gen templates where the user is a collaborator. Useful for managing or accessing document templates in Box.

parameters.name: version_header
parameters.description: Specifies the version of the Box API to use. Currently, only '2025.0' is supported.

parameters.name: pagination_start_marker
parameters.description: Defines the starting position for pagination of results. Requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

value_schema.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

This requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

parameters.name: max_items_per_page
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of Box Doc Gen templates to return in a single page.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the box API.

parameters.name: marker
parameters.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

This requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

value_schema.description:
Defines the position marker at which to begin returning results. This is
used when paginating using marker-based pagination.

This requires `usemarker` to be set to `true`.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
